intro: Meriania oblongifolia, commonly known as the oval-leaf meriania, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Melastomataceae and is characterized by its oval-shaped leaves and showy, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows as an understory shrub in humid, shaded environments.
